name: Wolf In Sheep's Clothing (Gloominator)
description:
You are a lone wolf who puts on sheep's clothing and steals farm animals.  Avoid the farmer and his dog like fire! It is a wolf eat wolf world!

Play in fullscreen!

<Space> to grab/eat an animal, 

<Shift> to put on sheep's disguise.

The devs' highest score is 12200. Can you beat it? :) Share your high score in the comments (with a screenshot!)

Created with Unity for Game Off 2022.

Created in collaboration with Alexrckt: https://github.com/alexrckt

Code for the game was written from scratch 

Art was borrowed from free source websites and drawn by ourselves. The heart and chicken thigh sprites belong to https://www.youtube.com/@Blackthornprod

Sheep sprites are from Stardew Valley.
